message.body: There may or may not be a new haven refugee sitting on your stoop.
Dammit! I was plugged into my drumset. :/
No worries :-) I made myself at home anyway. Ha GA
You interested in going to see roller derby at the Liacouras center this eve? We have an extra ticket. Doors at five, bouts start at 6
I would LOVE that but I have to go to ######'s bachelorette party :-\
I figured you probably had plans, but I thought is offer, just in case
